meanings.definition: The state of not aligning with any particular side or group.
meanings.sent1: Her nonalignment in the debate showed her independence.
meanings.sent2: The country's nonalignment in the conflict surprised many.
meanings.sent3: The nonalignment of the cat in the dog vs. cat argument was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: His nonalignment with any political party was like a lone tree in a vast field.
meanings.sent5: The nonalignment of the stars created a beautiful, chaotic pattern in the sky.

meanings.definition: The act of remaining neutral or independent in a conflict or situation.
meanings.sent1: The nonalignment of the student council president was respected by all.
meanings.sent2: During the negotiation, his nonalignment was seen as a wise strategy.
meanings.sent3: The nonalignment of the penguin in the fish-eating contest was quite comical.
meanings.sent4: Her nonalignment with the popular opinion was like a lighthouse in a storm.
meanings.sent5: The nonalignment of the compass needle confused the hikers in the dense forest.
